description: AI-powered meeting assistant that automates note-taking, summarization, and insights generation for your meetings.

actions.name: getHighlights
actions.description: Retrieves all highlights for a meeting by meeting ID

actions.name: getMeetingDetails
actions.description: Retrieves meeting details including host, participants, timestamps, and source information

actions.name: getMeetingsSummaryInsights
actions.description: Retrieves the meeting summary and AI-generated insights

actions.name: getTeamMeetings
actions.description: Retrieves paginated past meetings of a team

actions.name: getTranscript
actions.description: Retrieves all transcript sentences for a meeting with pagination support

actions.name: uploadRecording
actions.description: Upload a video or audio file for analysis and receive a notification upon completion via webhook

triggers.name: newMeeting
triggers.description: Triggers when a meeting analysis is completed and highlights are available.
